name: Universal Journey
description:
Universal Journey

The Sun has died, its time to find a new solar system! Propel your planet through space with the power of nukes.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 38 "Small World"

CONTROLS

  • Click the middle Star to start the game.
  • Aim with the mouse.
  • Click to fire along green trajectory.
  • Firing will cause a loss of planet integrity, lose too much and its game over.

TIPS

  • To enter a stable orbit nuke one way, then the other to slow down
  • Entering orbit is harder with a low integrity

CHANGE LOG

v1.1 Bugfixing only

  • Extended retry text length
  • Bug with planet flying out of screen
  • Decreased nuke damage from 5% to 2.5%
  • Increased music volume

Music
"Underclocked" - Eric Skiff
